summary: A FedEx invoice dated October 14, 2002, for account number 1144-2081-6, billed to Jeffrey E. Epstein at 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY. The document details shipping charges for 12 airbills sent and received in early October 2002, listing senders, recipients, and tracking information for packages shipped to and from Epstein's addresses and associates.

persons.name: Jeffrey E Epstein
persons.context: The FedEx account is in his name, and he is listed as the shipper or recipient on multiple shipments from his New York and Palm Beach addresses.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as a recipient on a FedEx Standard Overnight package sent from Jeffrey E. Epstein's New York address on October 7, 2002, delivered on October 8, 2002.

persons.name: Lauren Kwintner
persons.context: Listed as the recipient on a FedEx Priority Overnight package sent to a Passport Service Lockbox in Pittsburgh, PA, from Jeffrey E. Epstein's New York address on October 7, 2002.

connections.description: Epstein is listed as the sender and Maxwell as the recipient of a FedEx package shipped on October 7, 2002, indicating a logistical or communicative connection.
Epstein is listed as the sender of a package to Lauren Kwintner, a Passport Supervisor, suggesting a business or service relationship related to passport matters.

events.title: FedEx Shipping Activity
events.description: Multiple FedEx shipments were sent and received under Jeffrey E. Epstein's account between October 2 and October 9, 2002, to and from various addresses associated with him and his contacts.

locations: 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022-6843 (Primary billing/shipping address)
358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL 33480
Pittsburgh, PA 15250-7461 (FedEx P.O. Box for payments)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's FedEx account (1144-2081-6) was active and used for numerous shipments in October 2002.
Ghislaine Maxwell is listed as a recipient of a package from Epstein's New York address in October 2002, documenting a direct logistical link between them.
A package was sent to a 'Passport Supervisor' named Lauren Kwintner, suggesting Epstein or his associates were dealing with passport-related services.
Shipments originated from and were delivered to multiple Epstein-associated properties, including his New York residence (457 Madison Ave) and Florida properties (358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach).
The invoice total for this period was USD $304.34, covering 12 airbills.
